title: Was The Nintendo Direct Mini The Best Yet? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.28.22
description:
Gary and Tam break down all of the big announcments from this mornings Nintendo Direct Mini!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Intro
00:08:53 - Housekeeping
00:11:40- Persona coming to Switch
00:22:17 - Nier: Automata Comes To Nintendo Switch This Fall With All Content
00:29:37 - Portal Collection Shadow Drop on Switch
00:35:31 - Mario + Rabbids Sparks Of Hope Releasing October 20
00:39:43 - Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection
00:43:29 - Return To Monkey Island Is Headed To Nintendo Switch First On Consoles
00:45:18 - Ads
0047:31- Horizon show is titled and crew is revealed
00:52:56 - Halo Infinite melee bugs aren’t fixed because devs are working on other things
00:58:32 - Out Today & You're Wrong
Wed: Blessing and Janet
Thurs: Greg and Mike Bithell
Fri: Bless and Janet
